properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 10:58AM CST by NWS Tulsa OK
properties.description:
At 1058 AM CST, strong thunderstorms were located along a line
extending from near Maramec to near Hallett to near Cleveland.
Movement was north at 55 mph.

Penny size hail and wind gusts up to 50 mph will be possible with
these storms.

Locations in or near the path include...
Pawhuska...                       Hominy...
Cleveland...                      Fairfax...
Shidler...                        Wynona...
Osage...                          Hallett...
Blackburn...                      Maramec...
Skedee...                         Pearsonia...
Osage Hills State Park...         Okesa...
Webb City...                      Pershing...
Nelagoney...

These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio
stations and available television stations for additional information
and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for northeastern
Oklahoma.

NWSheadline: SIGNIFICANT WEATHER ADVISORY FOR CENTRAL OSAGE AND EASTERN PAWNEE COUNTIES UNTIL 1145 AM CST
